projects.name: Machine learning project - “Ted Talk Recommendation System Based On Collaborative Filtering ”
projects.description: The enormous flow of information on social media makes finding preferred content challenging. A machine learning-based recommender system can group similar users (collaborative filtering)to enhance the accuracy and relevance of recommendations

projects.name: Java project - “ Library Management System ”
projects.description: This Library Management System is an terminal run system which uses Java and SQL to manage book inventory and transactions with JDBC for database connectivity. It applies object-oriented principles to create an efficient solution for real-world library management.
